name: Inside the Seaside Inn
description:
Inside the Seaside Inn, a horrible being waits for it's next victim

This is a game I made about a kid who goes sneaking around inside of an old motel and is trapped by an unknown force who won't let him leave. Play as the kid and make your way through the eerie hotel to stop the unknown entity and escape. You need to explore your way past locked doors and ghost to escape the motel.

This is a horror game, so headphones, dark room, all that fun stuff. Download today! (Controls in game)
